tool_description: This is the open news api for the developer can use and top of this you can built new application :)
name: News Api
title: News Api

api_list.name: https://open-news-api.onrender.com/top-news?country=in
api_list.description:
?country=in
This query will fetch the news of the particular country. Your have to pass the first two small letter of country some of example are :
ae ar at au be bg br ca ch cn co cu cz de eg fr gb gr hk hu id ie il in it jp kr lt lv ma mx my ng nl no nz ph pl pt ro rs ru sa se sg si sk th
